info.name: MinLod MipMap Hack
info.description:
MinLod hack for having less blurring for textures under an acute angle (e.g. terrain)
Textured plane rendering is taken from this demo: https://www.shadertoy.com/view/MlsfRj

UPD: a simpler and more optimal solution, after discussion with Sergey Makeev
